name: 7fb115c8-1d8c-5ea1-a3b4-eba7d3aa7af9
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Mt Cimone, Italy (20120101 - 20140101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Mt Cimone, Italy (20120101 - 20140101)
